content: NJ Transit commuters, prepare to be inconvenienced, but compensated, when Penn Station undergoes badly needed repairs this summer. Morris and Essex Line passengers will have NO direct service to NYC, so you'll get discounted tickets, according to NJT's executive director, at a hearing with state elected officials, underway now.
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: His case of false arrest has become a rallying cry against alleged police brutality and racism on Long Island, NY. Now, this veteran corrections officer feels the only way to get justice is through a $50M lawsuit. Is it?
name: James Ford
title: Retired corrections officer files $50M lawsuit against Garden City cops who wrongfully arrested him

content: Is Andrew Cuomo positioning himself to be the anti-Donald J. Trump for the 2020 presidential race? His latest initiatives suggest that he may be.
name: James Ford
title: Part of a White House bid? Gov. Cuomo takes lead on environment after Trump pulls U.S. from Paris pact

content: These two customers at the Apple Store, Grand Central Terminal, NYC are complete strangers to each other. Is it just me, or do they look like identical twins, right down to their broken wrists?
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content:
I have quite a few friends who voted for Donald J. Trump. All make $100K or much more, have college or graduate degrees and most live in New York, New York. So much for the myth of the president having attracted only working class, red-state white people, as this Washington Post article points out very well. 
All of my Trump-voting friends are white, though. That's telling.
name: James Ford
title: Analysis | It’s time to bust the myth: Most Trump voters were not working class.

content: A little something for my wife in the same colors as our wedding bouquet for our anniversary today. But they're roses instead of protea, because we now have a cat, and protea, like most cut flowers, are poisonous to eat, and our cat... oh well. Happy anniversary, sweetheart and cat!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: If Governor Andrew Cuomo is not running for president in 2020, you can't tell it from his #FightBack event at the Javits Center with Nancy Pelosi that we're waiting on now. His new campaign is to unseat all 6 Republican Party of New York members of Congress. How that, along with his very public stances on immigration, climate change, health care and free tuition make him look like the anti-Donald J. Trump for 2020 in my report tonight.
name: James Ford
title: Photos from James Ford's post

content: Steve Buschemi and John Leguizamo warm up the crowd before Andrew Cuomo and Nancy Pelosi take the stage at the Javits Center.
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: Governor Andrew Cuomo and Nancy Pelosi launch the #FightBack campaign. It's meant to take back Congress for Dems, but does this look like yet another event where Cuomo is contrasting himself with President Donald J. Trump for 2020?
name: James Ford

content: As we prepare to hear James Comey's testimony, here's what President Donald J. Trump wants a spotlight on as well -- his pick as the new FBI – Federal Bureau of Investigation director. Christopher Wray was Governor Chris Christie's personal attorney during Bridgegate.
name: James Ford
title: Possible successor to fired FBI Director James Comey has ties to Bridgegate

content: As James Comey speaks about President Donald J. Trump, the president's election rival, Hillary Clinton, is preparing to speak to graduates at Medgar Evers College, CUNY. What do you think is going through her mind right now?
name: James Ford

content: "Losing an election is pretty devastating, especially considering who I lost to." -Hillary Clinton, at commencement at Medgar Evers College, CUNY.
name: James Ford
title: Photos from James Ford's post

content: Couldn't watch all of James Comey's testimony? Here it is in a nutshell, and it's not the best news for President Donald J. Trump.
name: James Ford
title: Five major takeaways from Comey testimony

content: After two schoolbuses collided in Mahwah, New Jersey, police direct children onto replacement schoolbuses from a makeshift evaluation center in a Burger King near the scene. No serious injuries to report at this time.
name: James Ford

content:
Latest on the double school bus crash in Mahwah:
147 students in 4 buses were headed from School 11 in Passaic to Museum Village in Orange County, NY for a field trip. 
The front bus tried to avoid a bag of unknown debris in the road on Rte. 17 in Mahwah. 
In its attempt to do so, the bus behind it rear ended the first bus, causing 17 children from both buses to have minor injuries.  
The injured are at Valley Hospital in Ridgewood.  

The field trip from School 11 in Passaic is canceled; remaining children are being transported back to school now.
name: James Ford

content: This is the most pleasant thing I've seen in quite some time. Thank you, President Jimmy Carter. The video is priceless. And thank you, Michelle Charlesworth, for bringing this to my attention.
name: James Ford
title: Jimmy Carter Shakes Hands With Every Passenger On Flight To Washington

content: Had the pleasure tonight of co-hosting the BronxWorks Gala with special guest, NBA legend Walt "Clyde" Frazier. I decided at the last minute to throw on a suit (I'd been out reporting in the heat earlier in a polo shirt and khakis), and boy am I glad I did! My tie may not be as hot as Mr. Frazier's, but it was a great gift from my wife and my daughter. Huge shoutout also to tonight's main host, Laura Behnke, who's awesome!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: A school removes a student's artwork depicting Donald J. Trump as a pig. Was the school right to do so? We're out gathering the story now.
name: James Ford

content: Should any Donald J. Trump images, for or against him, be censored at schools? You decide.
name: James Ford
title: NJ school removes pig-like Trump art project sparking debate about censorship

content: Headed to D.C. to cover the shooting of Congressman Steve Scalise and others. It happened right at The Y where my daughter and I swim when we're down visiting Nana and Grandpa. So tragic.
name: James Ford

content: At the shooting scene in Alexandria
name: James Ford

content: Unity march in Alexandria for shooting victims
name: James Ford

content: Latest at the scene of the Alexandria shooting, which remains an active FBI – Federal Bureau of Investigation crime scene.
name: James Ford

content: The Congressional Baseball Game is about to begin, despite the Alexandria shooting.
name: James Ford

content: Crowd goes NUTS as Alexandria shooting hero David Bailey throws out the first pitch, which was presented to him by Joe Torre and caught by Roberto Clemente, Jr.
name: James Ford

content: Congressional baseball shooting scene is still an FBI – Federal Bureau of Investigation crime scene, but the news overall is positive.
name: James Ford

content: Loved meeting the kids of National Dance Institute after their amazing performance tonight!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: The highlight of my Fathers' Day weekend was  having my dad and my brother -- two really great fathers -- here in New York from the Washington, DC area.  They came with my mom and one of my cousins, who'd never been to New York before, but after being here is determined to apply to a college in New York City (she's almost 17). But back to my men -- you two truly are among the best dads I've ever known. It's a happy Fathers Day with you all year long!
name: James Ford

content: I'm very proud and happy to announce that the new official Supreme Court of the United States photo was taken by my friend, and phenomenal photographer, Franz Jantzen. Congratulations, Franz!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: Sad about the sudden passing of the witty, clever, erudite writing force Larry Sutton. His official obituary http://nydn.us/2tfev71 doesn't quite do him the justice that the below The New Yorker magazine article about his and my great love, The Inner Circle Show, did a few years back. It's additionally sad that the article mentions another lost Inner Circle luminary, and phenomenal human being -- John Slattery.  May they both rest in peace.
name: James Ford
title: Ladies And Germs

content:
"What similarities I see between the criminality of the Nixon operation and... the [Donald J. Trump] White House.  ...There is no comparison. Yet."  
-from one of my favorite senators of all time, Lowell P. Weicker Jr., a Republican Party legislator from Connecticut. What he has to say about President Donald J. Trump is very well worth paying attention to. My only regret ever about Sen. Weicker is that I never got the opportunity to vote for him.
name: James Ford
title: Opinion | What the Watergate Committee Taught Me

content: Live view of the ride on the Cyclone at Coney Island Amusement Park, to celebrate the start of summer! From the back(!!!) of the ride!
name: James Ford

content: Keith, from Florida, makes the Coney Island Cyclone his 700th(!) coaster, with one of my closest friends, Jose. Keith is an active member of the American Coaster Enthusiasts. Congratulations, Keith!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: So happy to meet PIX 11 fan Deisha, who works at Coney Island Amusement Park's Luna Park!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: As we prepare to hear  #GOP senators' proposal to replace Obamacare, I found this proposal to be hilarious!
name: James Ford
title: Stephen Cares About Your Health (For Money)

content: Should Rikers Island jail be shut down? Mayor Bill de Blasio unveils his plan for doing so, with little fanfare. Why is it drawing criticism from both the left and the right?
name: James Ford
title: Mayor quietly releases plan to close Rikers; criticism follows

content: Look at what the phenomenal Nicole Johnson brought for me to celebrate my birthday. How very thoughtful! Nicole, you're the best!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos

content: So what do you think -- are video ads on the subway okay, or should the Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) stop running them? I found them very distracting.
name: James Ford

content: So very sorry to learn of the passing of the great Gabe Pressman. I'm honored to say I got to know this news legend through the Inner Circle Show. What an amazing human being and exemplar of journalism standards and ethics.
name: James Ford
title: Gabe Pressman, longtime TV reporter, dies at 93

content: After gunshots rang out last night at the New Jersey State Fair, three men are under arrest. How will it be tonight?
name: James Ford

content: Johnny Depp, Kathy Griffin, Snoop Dogg: no matter how you feel about President Donald J. Trump, remember, he's still our president, and the holder of the office deserves respect. Please exercise your right to criticize, disagree, satirize. But death threats to the president, real or fake, do nobody and nothing -- especially constitutionally protected free speech -- any good.  Thank you.  And may the list of celebs suggesting or condoning assassination not grow any more. Ever.
name: James Ford

content: Are metal detectors needed at the New Jersey State Fair? Why they've been deployed and how Jersey's not the first state to do so.
name: James Ford
title: New Jersey deploys metal detectors at state fair following gun incident on opening night

content:
An amazing resource, well worth bookmarking: every false statement  President Donald J. Trump has told since taking office. 
According to the well-researched article, "Trump achieved something remarkable: He said something untrue, in public, every day for the first 40 days of his presidency. The streak didn’t end until March 1."
I assume this will be an ongoing project by  The New York Times.
name: James Ford
title: President Trump’s Lies, the Definitive List

content: Had a phenomenal day at Charles Island in Silver Sands State Park with some of my closest friends in the world on Sunday. At low tide at this Connecticut gem, you can walk all 2/3 of a mile out to the island from the shore. My daughter and I learned the hard way that you shouldn't do it barefoot, though. Ouch. Fantastic, but ouch.
name: James Ford
title: Photos from James Ford's post

content: So all of my train options were canceled, delayed or crowded, then, once I finally got to my destination, this. No escalators on one of the longest stairways in the subway system. Hope Joe Lhota, the newly returned Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA), can straighten this out.
name: James Ford

content: Can you believe this was the least crowded car on the 1 train? It was packed due to all the problems on the letter trains because of yesterday's derailment.
name: James Ford

content: Do we even need to have school this week? Why a lot of parents say this week of just two half-days is a waste of time and money. And by the way, Schools Chancellor Carmen Farina took the week off for vacation.
name: James Ford

content: Loved meeting Frank and Badin, PIX 11 fans from Park Slope, Brooklyn, today!
name: James Ford
title: Timeline Photos
